welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Munhall, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allegheny County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Allegheny County Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport serves all major airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves both domestic and international flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a duty-free shop.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westmoreland County Airport houses all major airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Westmoreland County Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
